channel.title: Machiavellian on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Machiavellian on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Civilians
item.description:
There are two videos that are related in a way.

  • One is an old Ukrainian man showing destroyed military mashinery column part right around shattered village
  • Another is Ukrainian civillians who have maneged to talk-off a column to take a route not through their living place

I watched the first one only and the man curses alot. He praises Ukrainian military and curses Russian military. While showing his house is destroyed by Ukrainians right with Russian mashinery. You can hear that he is very confused by this. So probably he was told in advance to leave his house so he got his life saved but now everything he knew is ruined.
